languages.text: "Короче, ты сам{mf||а} не знаешь, чего хочешь: берешь меня под свое крыло, затем затаскиваешь в этот город, спасаешь от мучительной смерти, выслушиваешь... А затем прогоняешь! Ладно, будь по-твоему: я уйду, шерин. И не ищи со мной встречи — не найдешь".

traits.locale_text: "Короче, ты сам{mf||а} не знаешь, чего хочешь: берешь меня под свое крыло, затем затаскиваешь в этот город, спасаешь от мучительной смерти, выслушиваешь... А затем прогоняешь! Ладно, будь по-твоему: я уйду, шерин. И не ищи со мной встречи — не найдешь".

languages.text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."
languages.original_text: "Короче, ты сам{mf||а} не знаешь, чего хочешь: берешь меня под свое крыло, затем затаскиваешь в этот город, спасаешь от мучительной смерти, выслушиваешь... А затем прогоняешь! Ладно, будь по-твоему: я уйду, шерин. И не ищи со мной встречи — не найдешь".

traits.locale_text: "In other words, you do not know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you are turning me away! Fine, have it your way. I am leaving, shereen. Don't even go looking for another rendezvous with me — you will not find one."

"In other words, you do not know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you are turning me away! Fine, have it your way. I am leaving, shereen. Don't even go looking for another rendezvous with me — you will not find one."

"In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out! Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

"In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out! Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

"In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out! Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

languages.text: “换句话说，你并不清楚你想要什么。你把我庇护在你的翅膀之下，把我拖进这座城市，将我从痛苦的死亡中拯救出来，听我吐露心声……而现在，你却要把我赶走！好吧，你爱怎么样就怎么样吧。我要走了，亲爱的。还有，别再来敲我的门了，我的门再也不会为你打开了。”
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: “换句话说，你并不清楚你想要什么。你把我庇护在你的翅膀之下，把我拖进这座城市，将我从痛苦的死亡中拯救出来，听我吐露心声……而现在，你却要把我赶走！好吧，你爱怎么样就怎么样吧。我要走了，亲爱的。还有，别再来敲我的门了，我的门再也不会为你打开了。”
“换句话说，你并不清楚你想要什么。你把我庇护在你的翅膀之下，把我拖进这座城市，将我从痛苦的死亡中拯救出来，听我吐露心声……而现在，你却要把我赶走！好吧，你爱怎么样就怎么样吧。我要走了，亲爱的。还有，别再来敲我的门了，我的门再也不会为你打开了。”

languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out! Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

languages.text: «En otras palabras, no sabes lo que quieres: me has ofrecido tu protección, me has arrastrado a esta ciudad, me has salvado de una muerte atroz, has escuchado mi vida entera... ¿y ahora me echas? Pues nada, como quieras. Me voy, shereen. Y no vuelvas a llamar a mi puerta, porque no volverá a abrirse para ti».
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: «En otras palabras, no sabes lo que quieres: me has ofrecido tu protección, me has arrastrado a esta ciudad, me has salvado de una muerte atroz, has escuchado mi vida entera... ¿y ahora me echas? Pues nada, como quieras. Me voy, shereen. Y no vuelvas a llamar a mi puerta, porque no volverá a abrirse para ti».

languages.text: 「つまり、あんたは自分が何を望んでいるのかわかっていないんだ。あんたはあたしを手なずけ、この街に引きずり込み、耐え難い死から私を救い、腹の内をこぼす私の話を聞いてくれた…そして今、あたしを追い出そうとしている！いいわ、好きにすれば。あたしは出て行くよ。二度と私のドアをノックしに来ないで。あんたには開けてやらないから」
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: 「つまり、あんたは自分が何を望んでいるのかわかっていないんだ。あんたはあたしを手なずけ、この街に引きずり込み、耐え難い死から私を救い、腹の内をこぼす私の話を聞いてくれた…そして今、あたしを追い出そうとしている！いいわ、好きにすれば。あたしは出て行くよ。二度と私のドアをノックしに来ないで。あんたには開けてやらないから」
「つまり、アンタは自分が何を望んでいるのかわかっていないんだ。アンタはアタシを手なずけ、この街に引きずり込み、耐え難い死から私を救い、腹の内をこぼす私の話を聞いてくれた…そして今、アタシを追い出そうとしている！いいわ、好きにすれば。アタシは出て行くよ。二度と私のドアをノックしに来ないで。アンタには開けてやらないから」

languages.text: "Mit anderen Worten, Ihr wisst nicht, was Ihr wollt. Ihr habt mich unter Eure Fittiche genommen, mich in diese Stadt geschleppt, mich vor einem qualvollen Tod gerettet, zugehört, wie ich Euch meine Seele ausgeschüttet habe ... Und nun verstoßt Ihr mich? Schön, wie Ihr wollt. Ich gehe, Shereen. Und klopft ja nie wieder bei mir an – meine Tür bleibt für Euch verschlossen."
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: "Mit anderen Worten, Ihr wisst nicht, was Ihr wollt. Ihr habt mich unter Eure Fittiche genommen, mich in diese Stadt geschleppt, mich vor einem qualvollen Tod gerettet, zugehört, wie ich Euch meine Seele ausgeschüttet habe ... Und nun verstoßt Ihr mich? Schön, wie Ihr wollt. Ich gehe, Shereen. Und klopft ja nie wieder bei mir an – meine Tür bleibt für Euch verschlossen."

"Mit anderen Worten, Ihr wisst nicht, was Ihr wollt. Ihr habt mich unter Eure Fittiche genommen, mich in diese Stadt geschleppt, mich vor einem qualvollen Tod gerettet, zugehört, wie ich Euch meine Seele ausgeschüttet habe ... Und nun verstoßt Ihr mich! Schön, wie Ihr wollt. Ich gehe, Shereen. Und klopft ja nie wieder bei mir an — meine Tür bleibt für Euch verschlossen."

languages.text: « En d'autres termes, vous ne savez pas ce que vous voulez. Vous m'avez prise sous votre aile, traînée jusqu'à cette ville, sauvée d'une mort affreuse, écoutée quand je vous ai confié ce que j'avais sur le cœur... et maintenant, vous m'expulsez ? Très bien, si c'est ce que vous voulez. Je m'en vais, shereen. Et ne venez plus jamais frapper à ma porte, car elle vous sera désormais fermée. »
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: « En d'autres termes, vous ne savez pas ce que vous voulez. Vous m'avez prise sous votre aile, traînée jusqu'à cette ville, sauvée d'une mort affreuse, écoutée quand je vous ai confié ce que j'avais sur le cœur... et maintenant, vous m'expulsez ? Très bien, si c'est ce que vous voulez. Je m'en vais, shereen. Et ne venez plus jamais frapper à ma porte, car elle vous sera désormais fermée. »

languages.text: "Bir başka deyişle: Sen ne istediğini bilmiyorsun. Beni kanatların altına aldın, bu şehre kadar getirdin, eziyet dolu bir ölümden kurtardın, derdimi tasamı can kulağıyla dinledin, şimdi de beni bir kenara mı atıyorsun? Peki, nasıl istersen öyle olsun. Gidiyorum şirinim. Bir daha sakın kapıma gelme. O kapı bundan sonra sana kapalı."
languages.original_text: "In other words, you don't know what you want: you've taken me under your wing, dragged me into this city, saved me from excruciating death, listened to me spilling my guts... And now you're casting me out? Fine, have it your way. I'm leaving, shereen. And don't come knocking on my door ever again — it'll be closed to you."

traits.locale_text: "Bir başka deyişle: Sen ne istediğini bilmiyorsun. Beni kanatların altına aldın, bu şehre kadar getirdin, eziyet dolu bir ölümden kurtardın, derdimi tasamı can kulağıyla dinledin, şimdi de beni bir kenara mı atıyorsun? Peki, nasıl istersen öyle olsun. Gidiyorum şirinim. Bir daha sakın kapıma gelme. O kapı bundan sonra sana kapalı."
